title: Kum sul liam hnu kan nun ngaih lai tho leh thin
lyrics:
Kumsul liam hnu kan nun ngaih lai tho leh thin,
Rem Lal pian hun champha hmatiangah kan thlir;
Sik ni eng mawi leh zan buruak thiang leng vel,
Ngaih lai tizual tur renga'n maw.

Aw, thlir zel ila Bethlehem tlangpui,
Ran in tlawma Chhandamtu piang chu;
Hmanah miten lawm lo mah sela
Lalpa kan thinlongah Lal ber ang che

Leng zawng thinlai damten lawm kim tak ang maw?
Rualduh kal ta suihlong rualpuite zawng kha;
Ngai mah ila kuh kir leh theih awm si lo,
Rem Lal piang chuan thinlai hnem rawh.

Chhungtin lawm lai parang vul ni leh hun te,
Engtin hmang maw kar hla a leng rual duhten;
Thinlai damten hmang la, he hun lawmawm hi,
Hlimin lawm la, Lal lo piang chu.

Keini pawhin lawmna zai hla i rem ang,
Tumah thin na leh longlen pawh sawi lovin;
Bethlehema nau 1u piang Imanuela
Chibai bukin i kal ang U.
